title: Ticket #4984: condor_off attempts to contact the SCHEDD_HOST instead of local schedd
description:
I have not confirmed this behavior, but here is the report:

It appears that condor_off attempts to send peaceful shutdown to the master, startd, and schedd on the host, but when schedd_host is set in the configuration to use a central scheduler, the shutdown command is sent to the remote scheduler instead, which I didn't intend. I just wanted a peaceful shutdown of the local daemons only.
creator: zmiller
